name: Car Extreme 3D: Mega Ramp
description:
How to play
* If you want to experience a realistic car driving experience, you should choose steering.If you think it's difficult to control steering wheel and pedal, entering the settings you can choose the buttons that allow you to go left and right
* Before the time is up, you must climb the hills to the mountain through the tracks. If your time is up before climbing up the mountain, you can buy an extra 20 seconds by the coins you won or watching video.
* In case you pass the checkpoint in the Stunts, even if you fall from the cliff you can go back to that point by buying
Feature:
* Completely real vehicle physique. Your car moves the way you want it to, there is no artificial intelligence interference
* Changing environmental graphics as you play so that you do not get bored
* Specially designed parts that will make you addicted
* High graphics quality even on phones with low equipment
publishers: THAI HOA TECHNOLOGY AND MEDIA SOLUTION JOINT STOCK COMPANY
